channel.title: Finance
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from Finance, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Bari Weiss wants to save America. First, she’ll have to save CBS News
item.description: She built her power by opposing the media elite on a website bankrolled by anti-woke tech billionaires. Now she's running one of America's biggest new...

item.title: Recursion’s Incoming CEO Needs To Prove That AI Drug Development Can Pay Off
item.description: After a challenging 12 years trying to use AI to create new medicines, cofounder Chris Gibson stepped down as CEO last week. Can R&D chief and new CEO...

item.title: VPN Ban—iPhone And Android ‘Privacy Nightmare’ Is Coming True
item.description: You have been warned. This unthinkable "disaster for everyone" is now "actually happening." What you need to know.

item.title: A meeting with the Governor’s Office and an altered public document: How Elon Musk’s Boring Company got three safety violations rescinded in 24 hours
item.description: Lawyers and regulators say the Nevada state agency’s handling of the safety investigation went against procedure.

item.title: Amazon Boosts Its Water Replenishment Work With Four New Projects
item.description: Amazon has announced four new water replenishment projects in the U.K. and across North America, which are expected to restore over 2 billion liters o...

item.title: ‘Mazinkaiser VS Great General Of Darkness’ Blu-Ray Review: Super Robot Showdown
item.description: Following the first 'Mazinkaiser' OVA series, there was a wonderful follow-up movie, and it’s the movie that this Blu-ray wonderfully commemorates.

item.title: The U.S. aims to breathe easy amid China’s chokehold on rare earths, but loosening the grip takes years of concerted effort
item.description: U.S. races to establish rare earths supply chains domestically and abroad in "Cold War 2.0."

item.title: Two Roads To Usable AR Glasses

item.title: Today’s corporate boards look like the past: older directors, more male appointees, and less turnover
item.description: Also: All the news and watercooler chat from Fortune.

item.title: Visa leans into AI-enabled payments and stablecoins to stay ahead of the game in Asia
item.description: One thing missing from current chatbots is "the ability to make payment via an agent,” said Asia-Pacific president Stephen Karpin.

item.title: How to be strategic as market faces big questions about the economy this week
Chevron, Exxon to boost oil production, even as crude gets cheaper. How come?
Google to invest $40B in Texas data centers in major AI push
item.description: Google plans a $40 billion Texas data center investment, creating thousands of jobs as tech companies compete for AI infrastructure capacity.

item.title: U.S. stock futures little changed as investors anxiously await Nvidia earnings

item.description: New retirement plan contribution limits announced by the IRS for 2026 include higher 401(k), IRA and catch-up contribution amounts for enhanced retire...

item.title: Portable mortgages explained: What they are and how they work
item.description: The Trump administration is "actively evaluating" portable mortgages to help homeowners keep low rates as home prices remains elevated.

item.title: Mortgage rates tick higher for second straight week
item.description: The average rate on the 30-year fixed mortgage rose this week to 6.24%, according to the latest Freddie Mac data released on Thursday. That is up from...

item.title: Omaha Steaks CEO warns American families will soon face '$10-a-pound reality' for beef
item.description: Omaha Steaks CEO Nate Rempe predicts ground beef will reach $10 per pound by the Q3 2026, with prices unlikely to drop meaningfully until 2027, giving...

item.title: Silicon Valley Is Raving About a Made-in-China AI Model
item.description: DeepSeek is called “amazing and impressive” despite working with less-advanced chips.

item.title: Tech, Media & Telecom Roundup: Market Talk
item.description: DeepSeek, SoFi and more in the latest Market Talks covering Technology, Media and Telecom.

item.title: What to Know About China's DeepSeek AI
item.description: The Chinese upstart says it has trained high-performing AI models cheaply, without using the most advanced chips.

item.title: Reid Hoffman Raises $24.6 Million for AI Cancer-Research Startup
item.description: The LinkedIn co-founder is starting Manas AI with “The Emperor of All Maladies” author Siddhartha Mukherjee.

item.title: Can an App Replace a Personal Trainer? I Tested Nearly a Dozen to Find Out
item.description: Apps can add flexibility and freshness to your routine. Just try not to get injured.
